text: Border Prince Sven Carlson, the owner of the city of Wissenheim, asks you to find his advisor Ilmarin in the Dark Mountains, who has been kidnapped by the Skaven.

It turned out that the advisor you saved is the elf Ceridan, who is on a mission of extreme importance, under the assumed name of Ilmarin. He joins your cause, convinced that your path will lead him to success regarding his task.
The Ice Mage, Vladimir Stormbringer, resides in Kislev at the Tzarina's side. Pay him a visit and see if he can perhaps be persuaded to join your adventures.
The Ice Mage has heard your case and has decided that the best way to aid Kislev and the Tzarina is to join your cause.
Meet the Dwarven Ambassador Engrol Goldtongue in the Zhufbar citadel and he might be convinced to join you.

Engrol Goldtongue is the official Dwarf Envoy from the fortress of Zhufbar. His skills in diplomacy are unusually proficient for a Dwarf and he has resolved many quarrels with the Empire in his career which spans over two centuries.
Find Grudgebringer Commander Morgan Bernhardt, who is currently running the Red Moon Inn within Ubersreik.

Once, a young soldier, Morgan Bernhardt, had bitterly declared he could form an army better than any of the Empire's Knightly Orders, after having been rejected by each and every one.  An eccentric old Bright Wizard heard his impassioned speech and gifted him with his enchanted sword, Grudgebringer. Morgan would go on to earn quite a name for himself, assembling a nigh unstoppable mercenary warband that would make contributions to many major campaigns. This renown commander has now joined your cause.
